item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

oh dude thats easy one sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 03:18:09 AM[/size][hr]public void AttackMage(int index) { int playerIndex = index; //inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pimp")){ println_debug("playerIndex: "+playerIndex+" spellID: "+spellID);} client castOnPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex]; setAnimation(711); int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX; int EnemyY = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absY; int EnemyHP = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; int heal = 0; int myHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; int hitDiff = 0; int mageXP = 0; that should fix it cause all it is asking is that you declare it

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok i was fixing up barrow and i got a error what did i do wrong? if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { startAnimation(1979); calculateMagicHit(30); hitDiff = MageDamage; inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stayStill(); if(hitDiff >= 0 && hitDiff <= 200) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } else { stillgfx(85, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } } } if(playerBonus[3] <= 20) { castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10); }[code]client.java:17249: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable castOnPlayer
location: class client
castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .
